@graph.rdfs:label: Code-Survey: An LLM-Driven Methodology for Structuring and Analyzing Large-Scale Unstructured Software Engineering Data (Linux Kernel eBPF Case Study)

@graph.schema:name: Raw Linux kernel eBPF-related commits (2017–2024)
@graph.schema:description: Git commits filtered by eBPF-related keywords, containing commit ID, author, date, message, diff, and associated files

@graph.rdfs:label: Design of structured Code-Survey questionnaire (7 main questions + I’m not sure options)

rdip:outputDataset.schema:name: Final eBPF commit survey with 7 structured questions (summary, keywords, classification, complexity, components, logic, use-cases)

@graph.rdfs:label: Construction of per-commit prompts containing survey + commit metadata + diff
Automated survey completion by GPT-4o (single pass per commit)

rdip:usedSoftware.schema:name: OpenAI GPT-4o (via API or GPTs interface)

rdip:outputDataset.schema:name: Structured JSON survey responses for >15,000 eBPF commits

@graph.rdfs:label: Post-processing, cleaning, and manual validation of LLM responses (merge commits, unrelated commits, consistency checks)

rdip:outputDataset.schema:name: Final cleaned commit_survey.csv dataset with structured fields (classification, complexity, components, etc.)

@graph.rdfs:label: Statistical and temporal analysis of structured survey data (time-series smoothing, distributions, trends)

rdip:outputDataset.schema:name: All timeline, distribution, and dependency figures (Figures 2–17)
Derived insights on bug distribution, component evolution, feature dependencies, libbpf lifecycle, etc.

@graph.rdfs:label: Expert review and confirmation by >5 eBPF developers/maintainers and ongoing discussion on BPF mailing list

rdip:outputDataset.schema:name: Qualitative expert confirmation and planned rating of sampled responses

@graph.rdfs:label: Planned future improvements (multi-run averaging, O1 model, multi-agent, refined prompts, expert rating of responses)

rdip:outputDataset.schema:name: Roadmap for enhancing Code-Survey accuracy and coverage
